text: 8|43|avare (śatrukkaḷe) allāhu ninakk ninṟe svapnattil kuṟacc pēr mātramāyi kāṇiccutannirunna sandarbhaṁ (ōrkkuka.) ninakk avare adhikamāyi kāṇiccirunneṅkil niṅṅaḷuṭe dhairyaṁ kṣayikkukayuṁ, kāryattil niṅṅaḷ bhinnikkukayuṁ ceyyumāyirunnu. pakṣe allāhu rakṣiccu. tīrccayāyuṁ avan hr̥dayaṅṅaḷiluḷḷat aṟiyunnavanākunnu
